titles.title: A bill to provide that the provisions of chapters 83 and 84 of title 5, United States Code, relating to reemployed annuitants shall not apply with respect to postal retirees who are reemployed, on a temporary basis, to serve as rural letter carriers or rural postmaster.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3954-3955)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 3/25/1994--Introduced. Amends Federal law with respect to the Civil Service and Federal Employees' Retirement Systems to provide that certain requirements relating to reemployed annuitants shall not apply with respect to postal retirees who are reemployed, on a temporary basis, as rural postmasters or rural letter carriers.
